Transcription for 547609

My name's John, John, how I long, long may he reign,
On high, Lord, on high, so young and so young of age.
I do know God held him, God brought him from on,
Most high in the house of my Lord.
Lord God, light of your working heart,
Come all my kin, give me a strong hand,
All others give me light of my heart.
God, God, light of your working heart,
Come all my kin, give me a strong hand,
All others give me light of my heart.
